title: France panorama. [No. 72/05]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1.In the news: The French population - city versus country. Planetary clocks - the Oronce fine planetary clock. 2. Hear and see - the “Visiophone” or TV-telephone. 3. Rene Char - the “Rene Char and his friends” exhibition. 4. Maurice Chevalier - Maurice passes away at the age of 83. 5. The Madeleine Organ - the recently renovated Madeleine Church Organ.
